creator: huppe@mailtag.com
text:
There's a syntax error somewhere in the source and/or makefiles for the Tomcat 4 webapp module 
when compiling on FreeBSD 4.4.  The make utility errors and exits when it tries to invoke a "make 
build" from within the apache-1.3 directory of the source tree.  The file that I downloaded was 
webapp-module-1.0.1-tc401-src.tar.gz.  I can provide further information if needed.
